Promote and encourage diversity within our community - value everyone's input and ideas. Knowledge sharing of full range of Delivery/Project Management experience and domain expertise from Business interactions and considerations to process improvement to lessons learned (don't repeat my mistake) to awareness of LSEG initiatives to operations details. Target audience is all DM/PMs across programs (with a focus of core representatives). Monthly CORE team meetings, Webinars, Talks,
